name: Bananazon Drone Delivery Simulator
description:
Made by : Arnar and EMIDEX.

Music made by EMIDEX. link to his soundcloud : https://soundcloud.com/emid3xc

Everything else: Arnar

Sounds : freesound.org

Controls :

Arrow keys or W.A.S.D to move and Space to interact.

if you are wondering how this game fits the theme "Pack". you play as a drone that delivers PACKages. and that's why I guess.

This game is also kinda hard so idk.

Yeah and also this was made in game maker studio 2.
